Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Waldorf Astoria Berlin, you'll be centrally located in Berlin, steps from Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and minutes from Berlin Zoo. This 5-star hotel is close to Reichstag Building and Brandenburg Gate.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 232 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Digital programming and computers are provided, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional features at this Art Deco hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has 15322 square feet (1424 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional features at this Art Deco hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).
Make yourself at home in one of the 232 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Digital programming and computers are provided, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

With a stay at Waldorf Astoria Berlin, you'll be centrally located in Berlin, steps from Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and minutes from Berlin Zoo. This 5-star hotel is close to Reichstag Building and Brandenburg Gate.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Berlin Zoo - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Europa Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Theatre of the West - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kaethe Kollwitz Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
KaDeWe - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
The Story of Berlin - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Technical University - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Bauhaus Archive - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Victory Column - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Grips-Theater - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Bellevue Palace - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Deutsche Oper Berlin - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Gemaeldegalerie - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Schaubuehne - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 5.7 km / 3.6 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 17.8 km / 11 mi

The preferred airport for Waldorf Astoria Berlin is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Essential Information:
City tax not included and should be paid directly at the hotel Applicable from 14/Apr/2017 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Please note: Please be informed that the essential repair work in the wet areas (which include the swimming pool, Jacuzzi and sauna) of the Guerlain Spa at Waldorf Astoria Berlin has now been extended until the middle of September 2018. During this period, the Spa will remain open on weekdays between 10:30 am and 7:00 pm and offer treatments from 11:15 am with prior reservation. On weekends, the Spa will be open between 10:00 am and 9:00 pm and offer treatments from 10:15 am. The gym will remain open 24 hours. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

City Tax: Berlin hotels charge a nominal daily City Tourist Tax directly to the customer. Local regulations state this must be collected by the hotel and cannot be prepaid. No credit card is accepted, only cash. Please don’t hesitate to contact our call-centre if you require further information.

Important Information: Please note: type of bedding for children when sharing parents room - extra bed.

Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
